well, the dvd won't have the package versions from -updates and -security on it, so apt will go online for those
how can install packages from dvd?
any package whose latest version from all the repositories in your sources.list is on the dvd, will be installed from the dvd

you could disable your -updates repository (best to keep -security enabled) and then use your system that way
